title: The Battle of San Pietro
creator_credit: United States. Army Pictorial Service and John Huston
brief_description: Presents modern warfare from the soldier’s point of view. Stresses the number of men killed in taking one military objective. Shows how in the Allies Italian campaign, the people of San Pietro were too stunned to realise they had been liberated.
creator_credit_for_label: United States. Army Pictorial Service and John Huston
